import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import profileIcon from '../images/profileIcon.svg'; import searchIcon from '../images/searchIcon.svg'; function Header({ title, search }) { return (

{title}

{search && ( )}
{searchInput && ( setSearchInputValue(target.value) } /> )}
); } Header.propTypes = { title: PropTypes.string, search: PropTypes.bool, }; Header.defaultProps = { title: '', search: true, }; export default Header;
